column5: just wondering if anyone has been to lake st.john in the last few weeks and how it went. i now know how to get there and i hope to get out this weekend ( depending on the rain). thanks.
Couple guys from this board went on the weekend...I was reading about it...search through the last couple pages of threads I'm sure you'll come up with it.
ya i just read it and the outlook isn't so great
Gotta go deep at this time of year. If you do decide to go? Try drop shotting.
